name: Adjuvatorium
description:
This game is a finished version of the game we made for the Global Game Jam 2018 the theme was Transmission.

Adjuvatorium is a escape game where both players are locked in two separate rooms, they will have to try to understand how the two rooms work and see how to use the informations present in the rooms to find the code to open the door. 

the two player need to play separetly they can't look the room of the other  !
